long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Aids web page use for users with impaired motor function. 

Provides automated mouse clicking by dwelling at a location a configured period of time. 

Enables customization of pointer movement sensitivity and presentation.

Designed to be used in conjunction with ableX therapy devices and rehabilitation programs. 
Can be used with a standard input device such as a mouse.

Free account registration or try it out using the demonstration account:
user: browser_extension_demo@ablex.healthcare
password: browser_extension_demo
